alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla and southeastern Leon Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodville, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Woodville, St. Marks, Tallahassee, Wakulla, Springsax Park, Lake Bradford, Belair, Newport, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Lutterloh, Eight Mile Pond, Vereen, Southwood and North Florida Fairgrounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla; Leon
